description:
Non material admendment to planning permission ref P090206 dated 01 April 2009 for the 'Redevelopment of Regent Quarter Block D, comprising of part demolition, part conversion of existing buildings  and erection of part 2 to 6 storey buildings to accommodate 5439m² business (Use Class B1), 175m² restaurant (Use Class A3) and 54 residential units (19x1, 30x2 and 5x3 beds), with 135 cycle spaces, 3 disabled spaces and associated landscaping'.  The amendments comprise of: 

A] Installation of two number high level smoke extraction shafts with external louvres to the head of the stair core towers at roof level to the rear elevation
decision_conditions:
This application for a non-material amendment to planning permission P090206 has been made under section 96A of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990. The effect of the proposed changes to the rear elevation of 39-51 Wharfdale Road is considered to be non-material to the overall appearance of the approved development. The non-material amendments comprise of:

A] Installation of two number high level smoke extraction shafts with external louvres to the head of the stair core towers at roof level to the rear elevation.

For clarity, no other changes have been agreed with the Local Planning Authority under this application.
